headline.main: Study Finds Wide Drug Use in L.I. Industry

docs.abstract: Seminar sponsored by South Oaks Hospital, Amityville, NY, finds a substantial number of people working in indus on LI are involved in drug abuse; hosp med dir Dr Carone says there is serious drug problem among employes in indus, particularly in age group between 18 and 25-many of whom were involved with drugs while in school, but who are 'still looking for kicks'
docs.lead_paragraph: AMITYVILLE, L. I. -- A substantial number of people working in industry on Long Island are involved with drug abuse, it was revealed at a recent seminar at South Oaks Hospital here.
docs.snippet: AMITYVILLE, L. I. -- A substantial number of people working in industry on Long Island are involved with drug abuse, it was revealed at a recent seminar at South Oaks Hospital here.
